Enumeration Type Documentation

enum isshalvtnfTriggerSrc

Enum for selecting Trigger Source.

enum isshalvtnfTriggerSrc

Enumerator
ISSHAL_VTNF_TRG_SRC_REG 

Trigger Source is register write

ISSHAL_VTNF_TRG_SRC_HWSEQ 

Trigger Source is Hardware sequencer

ISSHAL_VTNF_TRG_SRC_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int

enum vpsissldcBayerDataFormat

Enum to define Bayer DataFormat.

enum vpsissldcBayerDataFormat

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_DATA_FORMAT_UNPACKED_12BIT 

Input/Output data format is 12bit unpacked

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_DATA_FORMAT_PACKED_12BIT 

Input/Output data format is 12bit packed

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_DATA_FORMAT_PACKED_8BIT 

Input/Output data format is 8bit packed

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_DATA_FORMAT_ALAW 

Input/Output data format is ALAW data

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_DATA_FORMAT_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int

enum vpsissldcBayerInitColor

Enum to define first color component for the bayer data.

enum vpsissldcBayerInitColor

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_INIT_COLOR_R 

First color in the bayer data is Red

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_INIT_COLOR_GR 

First color in the bayer data is GreenR

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_INIT_COLOR_GB 

First color in the bayer data is GreenB

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_INIT_COLOR_B 

First color in the bayer data is Blue

VPS_ISS_LDC_BAYER_INIT_COLOR_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int

enum vpsissldcLumaIntrType

Enum to define Luma interpolation type. For all other components, i.e. chroma or bayer, bilinear interpolation is used.

enum vpsissldcLumaIntrType

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_LDC_LUMA_INTRP_BICUBIC 

Bicubic interpolation is used for Luma

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUMA_INTRP_BILINEAR 

Bilinear interpolation is used for Luma

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUMA_INTRP_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int

enum vpsissldcLutDownScFactor

Enum to define down scaling factor for LUT.

enum vpsissldcLutDownScFactor

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_1 

no downsampling

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_2 

Down sampling by 2

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_4 

Down sampling by 4

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_8 

Down sampling by 5

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_16 

Down sampling by 16

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_32 

Down sampling by 32

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_64 

Down sampling by 64

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_128 

Down sampling by 128

VPS_ISS_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int

enum vpsissldcMode

Enum to define LDC Mode depending on the dataFormat.

enum vpsissldcMode

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_LDC_MODE_YUV422_LDC 

YCbCr 4:2:2 Lens Distortion Correction

VPS_ISS_LDC_MODE_BAYER_CHROMA_ABBERATION 

Chroma Abberation for bayer format

VPS_ISS_LDC_MODE_YUV420_LDC 

YCbCr 4:2:0 Lens Distortion Correction

VPS_ISS_LDC_MODE_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int

enum vpsisssimcopDmaMaxBustSize

Enum for selecting burst size for DMA transfers.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_DMA_MAX_BURST_SIZE_SINGLE_REQUEST 

Single Request only

VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_DMA_MAX_BURST_SIZE_1 

Max burst size is less than or equal to 2

VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_DMA_MAX_BURST_SIZE_2 

Max burst size is less than or equal to 4

VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_DMA_MAX_BURST_SIZE_3 

Max burst size is less than or equal to 8

VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_DMA_MAX_BURST_SIZE_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int

enum vpsissSimcopM2MMode

Simcop Open Mode, Used at the time of core Open Used to open core in either LDC, VTNF or LDC+VTNF mode.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_LDC 

Open core only for LDC operation

VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_VTNF 

Open core only for VTNF operation

VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_LDC_VTNF 

Open core for LDC and VTNF operation

VPS_ISS_SIMCOP_FORCE_INT 

This will ensure enum is not packed, will always be contained in int
